specific_question: What percentage of customers have utilized our remote diagnostics services in Q2 2024?
answer: Approximately 40% of customers have utilized remote diagnostics, with a 25% increase.
justification: Analyzing remote diagnostics usage helps identify opportunities to enhance proactive customer care.
dr_question: How can Elexion Automotive increase customer trust through after-sales support while balancing the need for exceptional customer care with efficient and cost-effective service?
